short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export Cardfight!! Vanguard decks from Decklog to the Cardmarket or TCGPlayer format

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CFV Deck Exporter generates a deck list following the Cardmarket or TCGPlayer format based on any Decklog list. This way you can check prices or simply save them for future purchases in one click instead of having to type everything by hand.

It also allows you to search any card in that list on Cardmarket or TCGPlayer by simply clicking on it.

The code can be found on the following Github repository: https://github.com/christopherkade/cfv-deck-exporter
